bill.summary:
No NATO Withdrawal Act
This bill prohibits the use of funds to withdraw the United States from the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO).
The Department of Defense shall report to Congress regarding:
NATO forces committed to operations in which the United States participates and the number of NATO forces killed in the previous year during such operations, U.S. readiness to fill vacated NATO positions resulting from a U.S. withdrawal from NATO, and a description of NATO members' defense spending levels.
